content: Today is Lunar New Year's Eve, it's time for pasting couplets, thorough cleaning, reunion dinner, and the crackle of firecrackers along with fireworks blossoming in the night sky. As for me? I'm writing couplets, how can I not celebrate properly during this time of bidding farewell to the old and welcoming the new.
The 2024 is just around the corner, in the new year, let's chase our dreams and head towards the distant stars together!
I offer you a prayer, may you shine as brightly as this twinkle star.
Today, I'm a little different from before. Will you keep cheering me on like you used to?
Moonlight spills into the bedroom, reflecting the Milky Way. Have a sweet dream among the creamy strawberries. Good night.

The fireworks today were so beautiful. It's the first time watching fireworks with you, and I'm so happy. Oh, and this is for you, I made it myself. Thank you for always being there for me, caring for me and loving me. Please accept this token of my affection. Happy Valentine's Day! I look forward to this day every year from now on.
